---
name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: "[BUG] <short-description>"
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

## Summary
A brief description of the bug and its impact.

## Steps to Reproduce
A numbered list of steps that can be followed to reproduce the bug.

## Expected Result
What should happen when the steps are followed.

## Actual Result
What actually happens when the steps are followed.

## Screenshots or Videos
Any relevant screenshots or videos that can help illustrate the bug.

## Additional Information
Any other information that might be useful for debugging, such as error messages, logs, etc.
